content: बलवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Strong, powerful, mighty; विधिरहो बलवानिति मे मतिः <ls>Bh. 2. 91.</ls> {@--2@} Stout, robust. {@--3@} Dense, thick (as darkness, &c.). {@--4@} Getting the upper hand, predominant, prevailing; बलवानिंद्रियग्रामो विद्वांसमपि कर्षति <ls>Ms. 2. 215</ls> {@--5@} More important, of greater weight; लोकापवादो बलवान्मतो मे <ls>R. 14. 40.</ls> {@--6@} Accompained by an army. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Strongly, powerfully, forcibly; पुनर्वशित्वाद्बलवन्निगृह्य <ls>Ku. 3. 69.</ls> {@--2@} Very much, excessively, in a high degree; बलवदपि शिक्षितानामात्मन्यप्रत्ययं चेतः <ls>Ś. 1. 2</ls>; शीतार्ति बलवदुपेयुषेव नीरैः <ls>Śi. 8. 62</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 31.</ls>
